haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Johann Hanneman
Fw Gebhard Schonbaum
Uffz Karl Nostitz

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 03/08/1916 near Trosly-Breuil.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc 37 was brought down by Gebhard Schonbaum of Jasta 16b.
The aircraft went down behind enemy lines.

Gebhard Schonbaum was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 03/08/1916 near Prosnes.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.49 was brought down by Benjamin Singermann of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Marcel Doussang was killed in action.
Benjamin Singermann was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.


Pilots lost were: 
    Ltn Johann Hanneman: Killed in Action
    Kmdr Patrik Schorner: Captured
